      Methods in Calculator with parameters of type CalculatorValue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CalculatorValue.add(CalculatorValue v)
      The following methods implement computation on the calculator values with error term having values as UNumber.
      void CalculatorValue.div(CalculatorValue v)
      The below is the division which divides the value with error term having values as UNumber and round off the error term to one significant digit.
      void CalculatorValue.mpy(CalculatorValue v)
      The below is the multiplication which multiplies the value with error term having values as UNumber and round off the error term to one significant digit.
      void CalculatorValue.setValue(CalculatorValue v)
      Set the current value of a calculator value to the value of another (copy)
      void CalculatorValue.sqrt(CalculatorValue v)
      The below is the sqrt which calculates Square Root having values as UNumber
      void CalculatorValue.sub(CalculatorValue v)
      The below is the subtraction which subtracts the value with error term having values as UNumber and round off the error term to one significant digit.
      Constructors in Calculator with parameters of type CalculatorValue 
      Constructor and Description
      CalculatorValue(CalculatorValue v)
      This copy constructor creates a duplicate of an already existing calculator value
